summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5708 for the improvement of 22nd Avenue Northwest, from East 68th Street to the south line of Ravenna Park Heights Addition, and from East 65th Street to approximately 50 feet south thereof; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenus; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75488, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
